title: Risk-Off Rout Drags Emerging Stocks to Year’s First Weekly Loss
description: A global flight to safety drove emerging-market stocks to their worst week this year, pulling a key index down from record highs, as volatility spanning commodities and technology shares unsettled investors.
content: A global flight to safety drove emerging-market stocks to their worst week this year, pulling a key index down from record highs, as volatility spanning commodities and technology shares unsettled investors.
